thought: I need to implement the Gmail send action parameters to send emails correctly to the specified recipient with the formatted message and subject.
plan: Set 'sendTo' to the provided email address 'qwuqwuqwu@gmail.com'.
Set 'subject' to the dynamic text based on index.
Set 'message' to the formatted body containing commercial entry and category.
Test email sending to verify correct delivery.
criticism: Currently, the email sending action has no parameters set, so it won't send any emails. Setting parameters is essential for functionality.

tool_input.comments: Send classification result emails to the specified email address with dynamic subject and message.
